thread.section_title: Goway Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Goway Travel | goway.com
thread.title: David Andersen
thread.title_full: Goway Travel reviewed by David Andersen

author: David Andersen
title: David Andersen
text:
Very nice experience. A bit more strenuous than I had in mind. I
walked at least 150 kilometers in the week. Also I would have preferred a little more balance with some urban areas. I do realize it was a "wilderness" tour. Great size, only 6 of us including guide who was a phd marine biologist. She was magnificent. Great lodgings and food. Comfortable travel between destinations. I have no complaints except it was a little to athletic for me.
